channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lockheed and Northrop shares dive as Trump says he’ll ‘not permit’ dividends and buybacks in defense sector

item.title: This 100-year-old stock-market indicator just flashed a buy signal. Here’s how investors should read it.

item.title: A shift in leadership is taking shape in the U.S. stock market. Here’s where investors can find fresh opportunities.
item.description: The S&P 500 has barely budged since late October. Yet beneath the surface of the U.S. equity market, big shifts have been taking place.

item.title: Gold and private credit are two parts of a well-diversified portfolio, BlackRock says

item.title: Buy this lithium stock that's set for a major rally this year after a strong 2025, says Baird

item.description: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) stock surges over 42% on positive Phase 1 data for MRT-8102, showing profound reductions in inflammation marker hsCRP. ...

item.title: Trump says U.S. to ban large investors from buying homes
item.description: "I am immediately taking steps to ban large institutional investors from buying more single-family homes," Trump said.

item.title: Nvidia's Jensen Huang said he loves this company. The shares could nearly double this year, says one analyst
